constituent: casting, metal, gold, longevity, bushes, glue
heisigStory: Metal . . . longevity. As you probably guessed from the elements, the key word refers to the casting of metals.
koohiiStory1: We take a casting because metal will have much greater longevity than the original.
koohiiStory2: They made a metal casting of the Chinese man who glued shrubs to himself to increase his longevity. It´s now sold around the world as it´s thought that having one will increase your own longevity..
